name: Temple of the Lost
description: Explore the Temple of the Lost, solve occasional puzzles, avoid deadly traps, beat the mazes and find what's hidden. Slowly uncover the secrets of this temple, while listening to ambient, atmospheric music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Quad Q6600 2.4GHz / Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Black Edition Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 630 1GB / Radeon HD 5450 1GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 150 MB available space
